title: Spend 10 Minutes Basking in the Sun
description: Natural sunlight is a primary source of Vitamin D, which can help improve mood.

title: Run at Full Speed for 2 Minutes
description: Short, intense bursts of exercise can help release stress and produce endorphins, improving your mood.

title: List 3 Things You Want to Do
description: Clarifying your goals and taking the first step towards achieving them can be very satisfying.

title: Meditate for 5 Minutes
description: Meditation can calm your mind and reduce stress. It's effective even when practiced for short durations.
